definition: local bosses, shady gentry (idiom); dominant local mafia
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Of all the fugitive local tyrants and evil gentry, those who have fled to Shanghai are the safest.
sentences.chinese: 這些逃跑的土豪劣紳，以逃到上海的爲最安全。

sentences.english: Everybody was for putting down the local tyrants and evil gentry.
sentences.chinese: 大家都贊成剝奪土豪劣紳的權力。

sentences.english: They have beaten down the local tyrants and evil gentry, big and small, and kept them underfoot.
sentences.chinese: 他們打翻了大小土豪劣紳在地上，並且踏上一隻腳。
